TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_mowas_pori, title = mowas_pori, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/mowas_pori} }

S.FORM: mowas pori bisya' ci ro nyu si mowas pori laga, yani nya p'iyu maha ya kingan mwalah la. trang mung ta hngiyang pori kwe, ana m'ima cyoli Tayal ga nanu yaca t'aring musa smreyu lukus ro tmapang mhbing Sali, yaca ini kyupiy 'walah.

mowas pori bisya' ci ro nyo si mowas pori laga, yani nya p'iyo maha ya kingan mwalah la. trang mong ta hngiyang pori kwe, ana m'ima cyoli Tayal ga nano yaca t'aring mosa smreyo lokos ro tmapang mhbing Sali, yaca ini kyopiy 'walah.
